1.0.0.name: wordpress/social-share-elite
1.0.0.description:
Author Site| Plugin Home Page

This plugin is the most efficient way to integrate the important social share buttons like twitter, facebook like, google +1 (plus one), LinkedIn and stumbleupon in three different position and styles.

  • Automatically display the social share buttons Above the post, below the post, both above and below or floating left side of post.

  • Flat/Round border style with/without background color. All easily configurable through settings.

  • Javascript is by default loaded in footer (recommended). This is the most efficient way to load scripts for social share buttons. This will make sure that your site contents are loaded first and the script loading do not interfere with them. Also site loading speed is better by doing so which is an important criteria for SEO. Option to load
